completed: Updated api-contracts.md with outbound call endpoints and session direction
Created outbound-call-modal.tsx with phone number input, country code selector, E.164 validation, call-in-progress view, status polling, duration timer, and end call
Added Make a Call button to agent detail page action bar
Added outbound/inbound direction filter to call logs page
Added direction badge to call log entries
Updated VoiceSession type with direction field
decisions: Used polling (2s interval) for real-time call status updates since no WebSocket infrastructure exists
Country code selector uses Select component with 20 common country codes
Direction filter uses pill-style buttons matching existing voice language filter pattern
Modal prevents closing during active calls for safety
